meaningMnemonic: If you <radical>poop</radical> on the <radical>root</radical>s of a <radical>building</radical>, the <radical>sound</radical> will <kanji>echo</kanji> all the way through the building, and each and every person in there will know what you did.
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>echo</kanji> doesn't stop there, this building's roots extend throughout the entire city of <reading>きょう</reading>と. The echo reverberates and soon everyone in きょうと is listening, horrified, to your poop.
